docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 是目前的默认 API 版本。

apis.short_description: 预览呈现的预配模板内容

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: kind
params.description: 模板类型，可用值：PXELinux, PXEGrub, PXEGrub2, iPXE, provision, finish, script, user_data, ZTP, POAP
